turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey there, I'd like to order a drinks from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a grande americano with a splash of coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, you said grande americano with a splash of coconut milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 831 Juve Street in Columbia, South Carolina.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i'll send your order to that location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 7 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
